Name: Best Friend
Description: Your best friend is small, fuzzy, and depend- able. Unlike all your other relationships, this one is simple and true. You can understand and communicate with your small companion and--although they may give you a hard time now and again--they are always there when you need them most. Whenever your pal could help you push your luck, mark fatigue to roll with Creativity instead of Passion. If your pet ever gets hurt, mark a condition.
